description: Table containing data about alternators in MS005, MS005A, MS008, MS002A database

columns.name: as_index
columns.description: This column represents the AS-PL Article of the alternator.

columns.name: napiecie
columns.description: This column represents the nominal voltage of alternator. Usually it should be 12 Volts or 24 Volts. For some units it can be 48 Volts

columns.name: natezenie
columns.description: This column represents the nominal output current of alternator.

columns.name: regulator
columns.description: This column represents the AS-PL number of compatible voltage regulator for this alternator

columns.name: plug
columns.description: This columns represents the compatible plug type. Corresponding picture which describe how to connect alternator with this plug has same name (JPG format)

columns.name: od1
columns.description: This column represents the pulley diameter of alternator
